tutors.name: Abdel
tutors.title: Professional IB Tutor
tutors.specialization: IB Maths Tutor | Khalifa University | BSc Mathematics
tutors.description: As a dedicated IB Maths tutor with 7 years of experience, I specialise in guiding students through both Analysis and Approaches (AA) and Applications and Interpretation (AI) at all levels. Drawing on my strong academic foundation from Khalifa University, I excel in breaking down complex concepts in algebra, calculus, and beyond. My tailored teaching approach ensures students build confidence and achieve outstanding results in IB Maths.

tutors.name: Huda
tutors.title: Professional IB Tutor
tutors.specialization: IB Computer Science Tutor | BSc Computer Science
tutors.description: Having logged over 500 hours of tutoring and 9 years of experience in teaching and the tech industry, I specialise in guiding students to success in IB Computer Science. My approach combines academic expertise with practical insights gained from working in Dubai's tech sector, helping students master key topics and excel in their exams with confidence and real-world understanding.

tutors.name: Sara
tutors.title: Professional IB Tutor
tutors.specialization: IB Chemistry Tutor | PhD in Biochemistry
tutors.description: With a PhD in Biochemistry from United Arab Emirates University and 4 years of experience tutoring IB Chemistry, I specialise in helping students excel at both Standard Level and Higher Level. My tailored teaching approach ensures students grasp complex concepts and achieve excellent results.

tutors.name: Zain
tutors.title: Professional IB Tutor
tutors.specialization: IB Physics Tutor | MEng Mechanical Engineering
tutors.description: My experience spans over a decade of teaching IB Physics, focusing on mechanics, thermodynamics, electromagnetism, and more. As a Mechanical Engineer with an MEng, I've guided students through both Standard and Higher Levels of the IB syllabus. By tailoring lessons to individual needs, I ensure students build confidence and achieve top results in their exams and Internal Assessments (IAs).
